ygData.subject: Re: Planes, here I come...
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve yet to come to a conclusion on whether Clarity is no taunt or very very low taunt. It s obviously nothing compared to a song like Verses of Victory or
ygData.messageBody:
I've yet to come to a conclusion on whether Clarity is no taunt or very
very low taunt. It's obviously nothing compared to a song like Verses of
Victory or Hymn of Restoration. I've had planes pulls come in while mana
regen was being played that walked passed me. I can't recall ever being
mobbed for only playing that song. If I go afk, even if a pull might be
coming in, I'll leave mana regen playing for the fight, so I'm not sure
if it's just a matter of someone else having a higher aggro factor in
the room than me or what.

Ariell Thunderwolf, Karana

"Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" wrote:
>
> dunno if i thought about it or just did it instinctively, but like you
> said
> i don't play any buffs during pulls. i play mana song all the way til
> the
> pull is in, then i start up with buffs. pretty sure mana song is no
> taunt,
> right?
>
> Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
> Tyria Sarkin, L35 High Elf Wizard
> <Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server
>
>
